Pocket Ship

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 354
sailing ship size [sailingshipsize]: 200
sailing max unit size [sailingmaxunitsize]: 4

Requires 15N10A to forge (N3A2)

This ship is able to grow and shrink whenever it is needed. The owner of the ship will be able to sail over the ocean of up to 100 human-sized troops.
